title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 185.7 - Condition after storage or transit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 185.7 - Condition after storage or transit

State Regulations

Decay, scald or any other deterioration which may have
developed on apples after they have been in storage or transit shall be
considered as affecting condition and not the grade. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
185.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
